message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I'm confident it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1500000. This represents a good starting point for negotiation, and I'm open to discussing your thoughts and counteroffers.

I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price for a product of this nature.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the pricing.  While $1200000 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to come up to $1300000 to demonstrate my commitment to finding common ground. This price still leaves room for both of us to benefit from the transaction.

I appreciate Alice's willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1200000. I'm willing to meet Alice halfway, so I'm offering $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair price that should satisfy both of us.
